website_summaries.verdict: As a new Adidas running shoe, the Runfalcon has not yet achieved total success. The shoe gathered mixed feedback from users. Some runners admired the shoe’s design, high-quality materials, and affordable price. Negative comments also surround the shoe’s hard cushioning and overall performance. With the negative comments, there is still room for improvement for this shoe.
pros: A few admired the good looking design and color options of the Adidas Runfalcon
Some users lauded the shoe’s high-quality materials
According to some comments, the shoe is very lightweight
The Adidas Runfalcon is very affordable
cons: The shoe is not as comfortable as expected, noted in some user reviews
The Runfalcon looks bulky, said a few runners

customer_reviews.title: More fashion than purpose..
customer_reviews.text: Running, mmmm, made more for fashion than running, lacing eyelets poorly designed, heel seems to fold out, instead of gripping the heel.. Comfortable, but not for running..
customer_reviews.author: Stevio

customer_reviews.title: Feet bruise after 2 days
customer_reviews.text: Terrible design. Material strains the feet when wearing, my feet bruised 2 days after wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat narrow fitting, hoping will spread with wear. Still good value.
customer_reviews.author: Rebels Abu

customer_reviews.title: Wearing out just after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought these In April so would have had them just over two months . I use these sneakers for general comfort so i don t understand how the have worn out so quickly . The issues is with the lining inside at the rear of both sneakers. The sneakers are comfortable but they should last longer without wearing out
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Murray

customer_reviews.title: Good cushioning
customer_reviews.text: Great cushioning. Lacing is difficult because of the rubber around the eyelets
customer_reviews.author: Gary Miller

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Good trainers, had to wait a time before being delivered esp as I paid for delivery
customer_reviews.author: Flips lol

customer_reviews.title: Plastic clogs
customer_reviews.text: Not great- just don't. There is a rigid plastic band across the top of the foot which has no give and I'd actually quite painful. So disappointed as have had some good quality shoes from Adidas over the years - but seems standards are slipping - these are plasticky shockers.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Quick brilliant and just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Grest show first pair I have brought in 19 years, seems the 90s air max I did have just came back in fashion as I broke them
customer_reviews.author: M0f0110

customer_reviews.title: Good value trainers
customer_reviews.text: Nice trainers, comfy and good value for the price I paid, hence the five star review
customer_reviews.author: craig warren

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my partner. Said they were a bit snug but I'm sure they will loosen up after he's worn them a few times. Good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Perry

customer_reviews.title: For the price very happy
customer_reviews.text: For the price a good pair of running trainers, only used for relatively short runs but comfortable and a good fit
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoes. As described. Arrived on time or earlier(can't remember). Good value for money so far
customer_reviews.author: Sotiris

customer_reviews.title: Product as described
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son who was very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Delia Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Great colour and style
customer_reviews.text: Great fit comfortable to walk and jog in. Total quality.
customer_reviews.author: keirack

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: The outside of my feet started aching while working out so to try and break them in I started wearing them about. I’ve never knew it was possible to have a pair of trainers that walk and fit so bad that my knees ache.... until now.
customer_reviews.author: Hughesy1981

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair and they have worn well and are very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Stephen arnold

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad trainer. Use for general use as light on feet. Apart from the daft over lip at heal of shoe, i would say for running, but more tham ok for genetal fitness and HiiT sessions.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Dunn

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Runfalcon Sneakers
product_meta.description: Start timing the miles when you wear these ultra-light running shoes. On the treadmill or on the road, they ensure a comfortable and safe fit thanks to the soft cushioning technology. The breathable upper made of mixed materials and the cage on the arch support provide extra support.
feature_bullets: Mesh and synthetic leather upper, lightweight EVA midsole
Rubber sole, stabilising synthetic element in the middle.
